page.title: 12Creativity in Ref.02760084
page.content: In an area of scattered hamlets and farmhouses with a sparse population and no public amenities,individuals seek an outlet for creativity in hobbies. No doubt there are people who knit sew crotchet and paint.There are also those who specialize and aim for and achieve a very high standard of work_ manship.One gentleman does woodturning producing bowls,platters,etc,suitable for table use;a lady spins wool using a spinning jenny;another lady works exquisite,fine embroidery.The work of these people is displayed at the annual Craft Day in Moretonhampstead.
